messages.message:
*Table Extraction Improvements - AI Hub 24.02 release*
Table extraction is one of the most common use cases for our customers. We have made many improvements in this area with the upcoming AI Hub 24.02 release.

Here is an *internal-only (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1o75xIwkwBrXO_1wB8MwCUOURuRI7hGsdEPxyersAlp4/edit#heading=h.pouyjcxkrf9s)* guide (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1o75xIwkwBrXO_1wB8MwCUOURuRI7hGsdEPxyersAlp4/edit#heading=h.pouyjcxkrf9s) for the improvements with sample examples for guidance.
• Single table extraction support in Build and Converse. 
• Filtering, sorting and column additions for table extraction. 
• Visual selection of tables w/o prompts in Build and Converse. 
• Provenance support for documents with both tables and multi columns. 
• Current Limitations. 
You can try these features out in the UAT sandbox. Looking forward to your feedback.

cc: @Lee @Matt Weaver @JD @joshbronko @Tom @Rakesh @Lalit
@jean @Josh Heidebrecht @Corey Brubaker - FYI, for creation of release notes and using the guide in Showpad for field team enablement.
